items.title: Sources: Jeff Bezos' Project Prometheus is raising tens of billions to buy companies hit by AI; it was valued at ~$30B in November 2025 when it raised $6.2B (Financial Times)
items.title_en: Sources: Jeff Bezos' Project Prometheus is raising tens of billions to buy companies hit by AI; it was valued at ~$30B in November 2025 when it raised $6.2B (Financial Times)
items.title_zh: 资料来源：杰夫·贝佐斯的普罗米修斯计划正在筹集数百亿美元收购受人工智能打击的公司； 2025 年 11 月筹集了 $6.2B 时，其估值约为 $30B（金融时报）
